  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_413</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_413</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Semejanza de polígonos</string>
            <string language="en">Similarity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ähnlichkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Similitude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Similaridade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Somiglianza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομοιότητα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de semejanza de polígonos. Se estudia en particular el teorema de Thales de semejanza de triángulos y se aplica también a la semejanza de polígonos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the concept of similarity of polygons. It studies the particular case of Thales's theorem for similar triangles and applies it to the similarity of polygons.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">semejanza</string>
            <string language="en">similarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polígono</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema de Thales</string>
            <string language="en">Thales's theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría plana</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der Ähnlichkeit der Polygone zu studieren. 
Sie studiert den bestimmten Fall vom Theorem Thaless für 
ähnliche Dreiecke und wendet ihn an der Ähnlichkeit der Polygone an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier le concept de la similitude des polygones. 
Elle étudie le cas particulier du théorème de Thales 
pour les triangles semblables et l'applique à la similitude des 
polygones.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar o
conceito da similaridade dos polygons. Estuda o exemplo 
particular do theorem de Thales para triângulos similares e aplica-o 
à similaridade dos polygons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare il concetto di somiglianza dei poligoni. Studia il caso
particolare del teorema del Thales per i triangoli simili e lo applica
alla somiglianza dei poligoni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει την έννοια της ομοιότητας των πολυγώνων. 
Μελετά την ιδιαίτερη περίπτωση του θεωρήματος Thales για 
τα παρόμοια τρίγωνα και την εφαρμόζει στην ομοιότητα των 
πολυγώνων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ähnlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theorem Thaless</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">similitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">avion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le théorème de Thales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">triângulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">similaridade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theorem de Thales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teorema del Thales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρίγωνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
